title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971Strange 'copy package' 2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5.
OB: When performing the 'copy package' operation on org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3 and selecting a destination folder xxx, the copied package 'ui' appears in the resulting destination folder xx.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project xxx. 2. Open the package viewer. 3. Select a package in the project (e.g., from the context menu). 4. Choose 'copy' from the context menu. 5. Select folder xxx as the destination for the copied package.
